name: list_transactions
description: List transactions from Privacy.com, with optional filters.

result.description: Filter by transaction result: APPROVED or DECLINED.

begin.description: Include transactions on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD, inclusive).

end.description: Include transactions before this date (YYYY-MM-DD, exclusive).

page_size.description: Number of transactions per page (1â€“1000, default 50).

page.description: Page number to retrieve (1 or greater, default 1).
